definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Aaron, elder brother of Moses Ex 7:7; the priest Ex 31:10 +; mentioned Ex 4:14, Ex 15:20, Ex 17:10, Ex 24:1, Ex 28:29 + (115 t. Ex); Le 8:12, Le 8:23 + (80 t. Lv); Nu 20:24 f Nu 33:39 + (101 t. Nu); 1Ch 5:29 +; Mic 6:4 (only here in proph.) Ps 77:21, Ps 105:26; called [[הַכּׂהֵן]] Ex 31:10, Ex 35:19, Ex 39:41, Le 7:34 +, v. Ps 99:6 [[בְּכׂהֲנׇיו]] ´[[משֶׁה וא]]; also [[הַכּׂהֵן]] ´[[בּן־א]] Ex 38:21, Nu 3:32 + (all P) called [[קְדוֹשׁ יהוה]] Ps 106:16; oft. named with his sons Le 2:3, Le 2:10, Le 6:2 +; ´[[בְּנֵי א]] in strict sense Ex 28:1, Ex 28:4, Ex 28:40 + oft.; [[הַכּׂהֲנִים]] ´[[בְּנֵי א]] Le 1:5 + Nu 3:3 Nu 10:8 Jos 21:19, 1Ch 6:42; of temple-priests in gen'l, as descendants of A., 2Ch 26:18, 2Ch 29:21, 2Ch 31:19, 2Ch 35:14, 2Ch 35:14, v. also 2Ch 13:9, 2Ch 13:10 & cf. ´[[הַכּׂהֵן בֶּן־א]] Ne 10:39; so ´[[בֵּית א]] Ps 115:10, Ps 115:12, Ps 118:3, Ps 135:19; [[אַהֲרׂן]] alone (= ´[[בֵּית א]]) 1Ch 12:28 cf. 1Ch 27:17.
